more_info.origin: A natural polysaccharide, produced from the tree Acacia senegal from tropical Africa.
more_info.side_effects: None known in the concentrations used, although high concentrations bring about flatulence and bloating, due to fermentation by the intestinal microflora (in the same way as all indigestible polysaccharides).
more_info.dietary_restrictions: Gum arabic can be used by all religious groups, vegans and vegetarians.
